member.name: T:Database_Classes.CatalogRequirements
member.summary: This class stores the catalog requirements for a given year.

member.name: T:Database_Object_Classes.Course
member.summary: Class storing the name, ID, and prerequisits for a course.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.i_NUMBERQUARTERS
member.summary: Number of quarters per year constant.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.ui_numberCredits
member.summary: The number of credits this course is worth.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.s_name
member.summary: Name of this course.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.l_preRequisites
member.summary: Prerequisites for this course.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.ba_quartersOffered
member.summary: The quarters this course is offered, [0] = Winter, [3] = Fall.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Course.b_requiresMajor
member.summary: Stores whether or not this quarter requires a student to be in the CS major to take it.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor which creates a Course object with a name and ID, and sets all other fields to default.
member.param: The course name.
The course identifier.
The number of credits this course is worth.
The status of this course requiring a student to be in the CS major.
member.remarks: The course name is the actual name of the course, e.g. Computer Architecture 1. The course identifier is the unique identifier for this course, e.g. CS311 which must not contain spaces.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Database_Object_Classes.Course})
member.summary: Constructor which creates a Course object with a name, ID, and the given prerequisites.
member.param: The course name.
The course identifier.
The number of credits this course is worth.
The status of this course requiring a student to be in the CS major.
A collection of prerequisites for this course to be added to the prerequisites list.
member.remarks: The course name is the actual name of the course, e.g. Computer Architecture 1. The course identifier is the unique identifier for this course, e.g. CS311 which must not contain spaces. The course pre-requisites can be in any collection that implements the interface.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Constructor which creates a Course object with a name, ID, and the given quarters it's offered.
member.param: The course name.
The course identifier.
The number of credits this course is worth.
The status of this course requiring a student to be in the CS major.
The quarters when the class is offered.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the ba_quarters array is not size 4.
member.remarks: The course name is the actual name of the course, e.g. Computer Architecture 1. The course identifier is the unique identifier for this course, e.g. CS311 which must not contain spaces. The quarters array considers [0] to be winter, and [3] to be fall.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean[],System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Database_Object_Classes.Course})
member.summary: Constructor which creates a Course object with a name, an ID, the given quarters it's offered, and the given prerequisites.
member.param: The course name.
The course identifier.
The number of credits this course is worth.
The status of this course requiring a student to be in the CS major.
The quarters when the class is offered.
A collection of prerequisites for this course to be added to the prerequisites list.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the ba_quarters array is not size 4.
member.remarks: The course name is the actual name of the course, e.g. Computer Architecture 1. The course identifier is the unique identifier for this course, e.g. CS311 which must not contain spaces. The quarters array considers [0] to be winter, and [3] to be fall. The course prerequisites can be in any collection that implements the interface.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Course.Name
member.summary: Getter/Setter for name of this course.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Course.PreRequisites
member.summary: Getter for PreRequisites list of this course.
member.remarks: The returned collection will be a read-only collection, and may not be modified directly.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Course.QuartersOffered
member.summary: Getter for quarters offered array of this course.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Course.RequiresMajor
member.summary: Getter/Setter for whether this course requires a student to be a CS major.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.IsOffered(Database_Object_Classes.Season)
member.summary: Checks whether this course is offered in the specified quarter.
member.param: Quarter to check.
member.remarks: Quarter 0 is Winter, quarter 3 is fall.
member.returns: True if offered, false if not offered.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.SetQuarterOffered(Database_Object_Classes.Season,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets a specific quarter to the given status.
member.param: Quarter to set.
The new offering-status for this course in the specified quarter.
member.remarks: Quarter 0 is Winter, quarter 3 is fall. True = offered, False = not offered This will change only a single quarter, to change all use .

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.SetQuarterOffered(System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Setter for quarters offered array of this course.
member.param: Array containing the new offering-status of this course for all quarters.
member.remarks: Quarter 0 is Winter, quarter 3 is fall. True = offered, False = not offered All previous offerings will be overriden by this method. To change only a single quarter use .
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the ba_quarters array is not size 4.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.AddPreRequisite(Database_Object_Classes.Course)
member.summary: Adds the given Course to the prerequisites list of this Course object.
member.param: A course prerequisites for this course to be added to the prerequisites list.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.AddPreRequisite(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Database_Object_Classes.Course})
member.summary: Adds the given Courses to the prerequisites list of this Course object.
member.param: A collection of prerequisites for this course to be added to the prerequisites list.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.RemovePreRequisite(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the course whith the specified ID from the prerequisites of this Course object, given it exists.
member.param: The ID of the course to be removed from to the prerequisites list.
member.returns: True if the course was found, and successfully removed. False if it could not be removed.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Course.ClearPreRequisites
member.summary: Removes all prerequisites of this Course object.

member.name: T:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object
member.summary: Base class for all objects in the db4o database, containing the basic construct used by all objects.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.ui_writeProtect
member.summary: Write protection to maintain data integrity of this object.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.s_ID
member.summary: The unique identifier of this object.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.WP
member.summary: Getter for the write protect value of this object.

member.name: P:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.ID
member.summary: Getter/Setter for the ID of this object.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default Constructor. Initializes the write protect of this object to default.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Database_Object.ObjectAltered
member.summary: Updates the value of write protect of this object.
member.remarks: If the uint.Max value is reached, the overflow will be ignored, and the write protect is reset to 0.

member.name: T:Database_Object_Classes.Season
member.summary: The season when a quarter occurs (Winter, Spring, etc.).

member.summary: Winter quarter, denoted by 0.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Season.Spring
member.summary: Spring quarter, denoted by 1.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Season.Summer
member.summary: Summer quarter, denoted by 2.

member.name: F:Database_Object_Classes.Season.Fall
member.summary: Fall quarter, denoted by 3.

member.name: T:Database_Object_Classes.Quarter
member.summary: Structure which contains the year, and "season" of the quarter.

member.summary: Returns a default Quarter object.

member.summary: Getter/Setter for the year member of this quarter.

member.summary: Getter/Setter for the season member of this quarter.

member.name: M:Database_Object_Classes.Quarter.#ctor(System.UInt32,Database_Object_Classes.Season)
member.summary: Constructor for this structure.
member.param: The year of this quarter.
The season of this quarter.
member.remarks: The year is an unsigned integer, and should be of the form YYYY, e.g. 2018. The season is an integer in the range 0-3, or alternatively the type Season.
